name: InfoPath Form Template File
summary: Learn about .XSN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XSN files include a schema (.XSD) file, an .XSL style sheet, .JS or .VBS script files, and image files used by the form interface. Individual files can be extracted from XSN files by choosing File â†’ Extract Form Files within InfoPath.

description: Form template used by Microsoft InfoPath, a form design and creation program; saved as a compressed .CAB (cabinet) file, which contains multiple files.
